episode.title: Are There Ever Too Many Love Songs?
episode.rawTitle: 387: ‘Are There Ever Too Many Love Songs?’, With Sebastiaan de With and Ben Sandofsky
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guests Sebastiaan de With and Ben Sandofsky, co-founders of Lux, join the show to talk about their apps (Halide, Spectre, and Orion) and speculate about next week’s “Scary Fast” Apple event.
episode.showNotes:
Special guests Sebastiaan de With and Ben Sandofsky, co-founders of Lux, join the show to talk about their apps (Halide, Spectre, and Orion) and speculate about next week’s “Scary Fast” Apple event.

Sponsored by:

  • Squarespace: Make your next move. Use code talkshow for 10% off your first order.
  • Trade Coffee: Let’s coffee better. Get a free bag of fresh coffee with any Trade subscription.

Links:

  • Lux Optics Incorporated:.
    • Halide: "The best pro camera iPhone and iPad".
    • Spectre: "The AI-powered long exposure camera for everyone".
    • Orion: "Turn your iPad into an HDMI monitor".
  • Jelmar Geertsma -- type designer who's collaborated with Lux.
    • Halide Router, Halide's custom typeface.
  • Baratza's Virtuoso coffee grinder -- I own an older model, but it has the same gross logo.
  • Camera+ app pulled from App Store back in 2010 for using the hardware volume buttons as shutter buttons.

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
